thread.title: No Wonder Modern Sedans Are Less and Less Popular

author: wsjcom
title: No Wonder Modern Sedans Are Less and Less Popular
text:
Regarding “Sedan Weakness Dents Auto Sales” (Business & Finance, May 2): Try putting three child seats in the back seat of a sedan and you’ll know why SUVs have become so popular. Most new four-door sedans are really four-passenger cars with back seats comfortable only for children and adults 5 feet or less in height. Auto designers don’t seem to understand that four adults should be able to ride comfortably in a four-door sedan.
Jay Dunton
...
